description: Magic Minutes will soon become your best friend.... Magic Minutes is highly functional and very easy to use. Its perfect for jotting down anything!.. Ideal for Shopping Lists, Todo Lists, Forget-me-Nots, Business meetings or pretty much anything you would normally use a note-pad for.  If you purchase this app, please do not provide low ratings without allowing me a chance to fix any issues first.  Since HP/Palm does not do a very good job of passing along feedback, I would prefer you contact me directly.  You can email me directly at magicminutes@qpaulson.net.  I will reply to your comments / feedback as timely as possible.  I appreciate your support - I look forward to building new features and working with you all to make this application successful.
